title: 1 dead after officer-involved shooting in Alexandria 21 minutes ago
content:
1 dead after officer-involved shooting in Alexandria

1 dead after officer-involved shooting in Alexandria 
An unidentified person is dead after an officer-involved shooting in Alexandria on Wednesday afternoon.

Louisiana State Police troopers and Alexandria police block Lee Street at Government Street on Wednesday afternoon after an officer-involved shooting just down the street killed one person. (Photo: Melissa Gregory/mgregory@thetowntalk.com) 

An unidentified person is dead after an officer-involved shooting in Alexandria on Wednesday afternoon. 

Details remain sketchy, but a team comprising of Alexandria Police Department Rapides Parish Sheriff's Office and U.S. Marshals were in the area of Lee Street near Duhon Lane when the incident happened. 

A marshal shot one person, who died. 

The Save More convenience store on Lee Street, next to Commerce Street, was surrounded by crime scene tape. Officers from various agencies were working in the parking lot and next to the store. 

Alexandria police say more information will be released soon.
